titles.title: To amend the child and adult care food program under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide alternative reimbursement rates under that program for family or group day care homes located in less populous areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

term.name: Federal aid to day care centers

bill.summary: 10/4/2000--Introduced. Amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide alternative reimbursement rates under the child and adult care food program for family or group day care homes located in less populous areas.
